Name: Container with Osiris figure
Description: This 'reliquary' is a combination of an enthroned Osiris and an obelisk. Osiris is seated on a throne, which instead of a back has an obelisk The latter is hollow and is closed at the back by a lid. The Osiris figure is gilded. On the sides, the goddesses Isis and Nephthys are depicted in polychrome.
